card.name: Rothus, the Traveler
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Rumbling Terahorn
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Qurian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Scramble Typhoon
card.text: ■ Draw 5 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand.

card.name: Super Flaming Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Robby, Cho Alchemy
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ Doron Go ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Alchemy" in their Card Name

card.name: Katsudon, Kung Fu Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ Doron Go ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Kung Fu" in their Card Name

card.name: Ikari, Hustle Commander
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Shield Go ■ While this creature is Face Up

card.name: Canis, Wonderful One
card.text: ■ This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it. ■ Shield Go ■ While this creature is Face Up

card.name: Rage Crystal of Outrage
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more and return it to its owner's hand. Then, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Prometheus, Splash Axe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.
